plushiehorse-desc: This is a specialized extension specifically for the [https://plushie.horse plushie.horse] Web site. It will probably be of little use outside of that context.  Code repository [https://github.com/CorpulentBrony/PlushieHorse on GitHub].
plushiehorse-error-hash-mismatch: $1: For property $2: Hash mistmatch for value "$3"; data may have been lost or corrupted.
plushiehorse-pic-alt: A random plushie image from Derpibooru
plushiehorse-seo-description: The work of pony plush maker $1 as featured on $2, including prices, features, and sizes offered.
plushiehorse-seo-image-alt-text: An example image of a plush made by $1.
